author: awmacp
content: Hi, can anyone point me to some research literature on the security model of optimistic rollups?

author: killari.
content: have you checked the sites of such rollups if they point to any?

author: awmacp
content: I've done some searching of that nature (also Google, arxiv) and will do more, as well as asking on here.

author: lattechad
content: I've recently read that the Ethereum Foundation are working with Loopring on a zkEVM for the Loopring protocol. Is there any info on how this is progressing and when we might see it live? Is this the only zkEVM that EF has played a part in developing?

author: treyzania
content: I don't know if EF worked on it but zksync has deployed a prototype of their version to a testnet
